name: Meathead Calculator

screenshots.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 540 720' style='background:%23fff'><rect width='540' height='720' fill='%23fff'/><text x='270' y='150' font-size='48' font-weight='900' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23000'>Meathead Calculator</text><text x='270' y='200' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23666'>Calculate barbell weights instantly</text><rect x='120' y='350' width='300' height='80' fill='none' stroke='%23000' stroke-width='3' rx='8'/><text x='270' y='400' font-size='32' font-weight='700' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23000'>225</text><rect x='70' y='480' width='400' height='120' fill='%23000' rx='8'/><text x='270' y='550' font-size='24' font-weight='900' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23fff'>Put 90 lbs on each side of the bar.</text></svg>
